# Draft:National Union of Marine Cooks and Stewards

The National Union of Marine Cooks and Stewards (NUMCS) was an industrial union affiliated with the Congress of Industrial Organizations (CIO). Among its leaders was Stephen R. Blair. NUMCS merged later merged into the Seafarers International Union of North America.
National Union of Marine Cooks and Stewards (NUMCS)
